note:
I went to the woods
because I wanted to live deliberately.
I wanted to live deep
and suck out all the marrow of life！
To put to rout all that was not life.
And not, when I came to die,
discover that I had not lived.

Ariel: William Shakespeare "The Tempest" / "Lion of God" / The elf of fire and the atmosphere / a reble angel of fallen angels in Milton's "Paradise Lost" . In Jewish folklore, an angel in charge of demons，also an angel of wisdom and cure.
